attributes.action: to look into the failings/ under funding and under research into women health
attributes.additional_details: as a 28 year old women who has suffered for over 17 years with womens health issues such as endometriosis and PMDD i have a good incite into what the system is lacking in regard to support and help with women suffering with similar conditions. i would like the government to take action to help support women and girls and also stand up for our rights to better health care. the lack of research into women's health is shocking and has a significant impact on the quality of life of women in the UK.
attributes.background: i would like the government to take women's health seriously and work with healthcare suppliers and women to ensure that the gender health gap is closed and better outcomes are given for  all women experiencing debilitating chronic conditions and all other illnesses that mainly affect women.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732291
